text:
This is the expected behavior:

Public files will be accessible publicly and index on search.

Public no index files will be accessible publicly and not index on search

Private files are only accessible to internal HubSpot users, and as such also don't index

Files used on the website need to be one of the two public options

Thanks <@U03AKL6Q1B2> but is  there a way I can achieve below

The desired behavior is that all Files stored in the HubSpot filemanager are Private, but as long as you're logged on the website with membership or with SSO you should be able to see them on website pages
How to set different logos for different languages in same portal ?
following - interested too as I don’t see an option
I never would’ve guessed. Thank you!

In the header module, when you create the multi language variants, you can configure the settings unique for each language, including the logo file.

If you're using a theme where the logo comes from Theme Settings, this wouldn't be possible .

An example of a theme that could support this functionality would be Power Pro.
